name: Welcome to Bowl-O-World
description:
I played through the Bioshock games recently and really liked how stories were delivered via audio logs for the player to collect. This game is me practicing  Environmental Storytelling within a Walking Simulator. There are 10 Audio-containing memories floating around in blue orbs. Controls: WASD + mouse

VISUAL/AUDIO WARNINGS: -Game features dynamic lighting and moving orbs of light, so the lights/colors will pulse. 

-Also, I don't have headphones so I don't know if the volume is too high, so be careful with that, too!

Textures used (and edited)

Coppercube "Do later" Extension: https://www.ambiera.com/coppercube/download_extensions.html

This was made for the Liminal Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/liminal

This game was worked on from July 30, 2022 - August 6, 2022
